casebody.data:
Bradley M. Bates v. Bernard L. Desenberg et al. Taxation of costs — Counsel fee. Submitted October 4, 1881. Pope & Ha/rt for the motion. Padgham dk Padgham against.

•Counsel -who have prepared for hearing are not deprived of their right to a full counsel fee by the fact, merely, that the case was disposed of on grounds not raised in the argument.

Motion for retaxation of costs.

Denied October 5.
